```
ACTIONS = ["2->1","1->2","2->3","3->2","2->4","4->2","2->5","5->2","2->6","6->7","7->6", "6->2", "2->9", "9->8", "8->9", "9->2"] # these are all the possible actions our robot can take (2 * our total number of doorways!)
```
